sentences.sContent: Allow any part of the subtle bodies that is twisted to untwist and separate from any other that one is intertwined with.
sentences.sContent_eng: Allow any part of the subtle bodies that is twisted to untwist and separate from any other that one is intertwined with.
sentences.sCn: 允许精细身体中扭曲的任何部分解开扭曲，从混杂在一起的其它部分中分离开来。

synos.tran: 松开搓合之线；拆开（搓合的绳，线等）；解开
解开；拆开（搓合的绳，线等）；松开搓合之线

trans.tranCn: 拆开(搓合的绳,线等), 解开
